node.display_long_description:
RPG fans, it’s time to unite… in VR!
Do you have the mettle to survive a monster-infested dungeon crawler that immerses players in the classic fantasy RPG genre like never before? Time to find out!
A dark force has taken over the underworld in Resolution Games’ Demeo, and it’s a world you’re not likely to survive alone. Terrors and treasure await as you and your band of warriors come together for a virtual game night to brave the corrupted catacombs and delve into this truly authentic tabletop experience.  
Up to four players assume the role of eagle-eyed hunter, mystical sorcerer, deadly assassin or protective guardian. But choose your champions wisely in this cooperative adventure, for once you have ventured into the Elven Necropolis, players must work together to vanquish the unholy armies of The Mad Elven King and set him free... or die trying.
Demeo has an extensive content map planned to ensure adventurers have a steady supply of treasure and glory. Download now!

nodes.title: Demeo is now available on Oculus Quest!
nodes.body_text:
Do you have the mettle to survive the monster-infested dungeons of Demeo? Your time has come! Demeo is now available on Oculus Quest.

PLAY NOW!

Join our Discord to find more players, discuss tactics or just hang out!

nodes.title: Official Discord Server
nodes.body_text:
We just launched a Discord! Join today if you want to learn more about Demeo or want to find friends to play with when the game launches on May 6. 
Join here!

node.reviewDescription:
The one thing I've missed the most since the world went into lockdown over a year ago has been the chance to get together with friends a play some board games, nothing quite beats sitting around with a few drinks, some snacks, good company and a game to get stuck into. Demeo aims to replicate this feeling for the digital age, transfering the classic tabletop RPG formula into an easy to pick up and play (but deceptively deep if you want to look at the numbers & really strategise) experience for VR users.

I've played about 5 full rounds of the game so far with various groups of people and it's incredible to me how it really manages to capture the feeling of sitting around a table together. With four different classes to chose from, each with their own deck of unique cards & abilities that are picked up and earned throughout each run, teams need to communicate and plan their moves carefully or risk being overrun by swarms of enemies that could be lurking behind each door. Finding the key to progress deeper into the dungeon is the goal here and reaching the final floor will pit you against a boss creature with an incredible amount of health and an army of drones at their disposal.

Currently the game has just one campaign to beat but the procedural generation element means the enemy placement, world map & item placement are different everytime you load in. I have personally had a completely different experience each and everytime I've played but this was also due to the personalities of those I was playing with each time really shining through.

Demeo is a fresh take on multiplayer VR experiences and as long as the content keeps coming this one is bound to be well recieved by those who are longing for that tabletop experience, those with a love of D&D & those who just want a laid back experience to play with some friends.
node.reviewTitle: A tabletop RPG for the digital age

website_page_meta.description:
Gather your friends and brave the unhallowed catacombs of Resolution Games’ RPG dungeon crawler, Demeo. 
Terrors and treasure await as you and up to three friends unite in this cooperative turn-based game to combat the forces of evil and vanquish the armies of The Mad Elven King. 
But choose your champions wisely in this virtual tabletop game; once you have ventured into the necropolis, you and your band of warriors must conquer the nether floors... or die trying.  Download now!
website_page_meta.title: Demeo · Oculus Quest
